Text: Thanks for uploading the new season!!

I don't know why it's so hard to find? 
If you like cars, it's a must watch show.
No Good, I had nothing but Sync issues. Anyone else having the same problem. Kind of disappointed & expected better.

No sync problem here viewing this file on VLC under Win7.

However, this appears to be a special episode made from the first episode of season one (or a mix from more episodes? Don't know for sure) remodeled with some show facts, tweets and bonus scene.  I hope that the remaining of season 2 will offer more than that.
